title: Voxiversity: Thucydides S2
author: VD
content_html: Here’s the second quiz on The History of the Peloponnesian War, which runs from Book One chapter 116 to Book Two chapter 47. There is a time limit of five minutes, which is plenty of time to answer the multiple choice questions. Feel free to jump right in with your thoughts on this second section; as before, I shall add mine later today once people have had a reasonable opportunity to take the quiz.
content_text:
Here’s
the second quiz on The History of the Peloponnesian War
, which runs from Book One chapter 116 to Book Two chapter 47.  There is a time limit of five minutes, which is plenty of time to answer the multiple choice questions.  Feel free to jump right in with your thoughts on this second section; as before, I shall add mine later today once people have had a reasonable opportunity to take the quiz.
